name: RidiciCanvas
tagline: A stupidly inefficient and bad NodeJS shared canvas implementation using Express and Socket.IO for the server and p5.js for the client
body:
# RidiciCanvas
A stupidly inefficient and bad NodeJS shared canvas implementation using Express and Socket.IO for the server and p5.js for the client

## Disclamer
This is the first thing almost ever I have made in JS. I like it, but Java is better. Play here:
http://ridicicanvas.herokuapp.com/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
